issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently, reading encoded ORC data does not support data type conversion.  So, encoded reading and cache populating needs to be disabled.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Need to disable encoded LLAP I/O for ORC when there is data type conversion  (Schema Evolution)

comments.body: Ok, pending new ORC release that contains ORC-380.

[~prasanth_j] I'm considering committing this change first and creating a follow-on ticket to loosen up the restrictions by checking ORC-380's isOnlyImplicitConversion() method when the new ORC release goes out...

ATTACHMENT ID: 12928862 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
[~prasanth_j] Is the orc_ppd_schema_evol_3a test failure related to the counters and is it a stable test?
orc_ppd_schema_evol_3a is a stable test. The test diff here is expected since llap io is completely disable for schema evolution.
I can't produce a stable orc_ppd_schema_evol_3a  Q file result on my laptop that passes Hive QA.
Wait a minute -- orc_ppd_schema_evol_3a is configured for MiniLlap not MiniLlapLocal...
